hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir:Umm Salamah asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) permission for getting herself cupped. He commanded Abu Tibah to cup her. The transmitter said: I think he was her foster-brother or a boy not yet of age

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْعَبْدِ يَنْظُرُ إِلَى شَعْرِ مَوْلاَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: A Slave Looking At The Hair Of His Mistress
